MemoryInfobox.description: 'Unable to cross the Tartaros Veil|Veil of Tartaros without the Armor of the Fallen, Elpenor asked Kassandra to meet him at Kronos' Treasury, where they hoped to retrieve the gauntlets.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades'
MemoryInfobox.location: Kronos' Treasury, The Scorched Lands, the Underworld

General_Description: '''Arms of Atonement''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met with [[Elpenor]], who agreed to aid her locate the [[Gauntlets of the Fallen|gauntlets]] which would allow her to cross a [[Tartaros Veil]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra met with Elpenor at the entrance to [[Kronos' Treasury]].
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Kassandra! I'm glad you've come.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Would you blame me if I didn't?''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''I'll earn your trust in time, and we can begin that process now. This door will lead us to Kronos' Treasury, where the [[Gauntlets of the Fallen|gauntlets]] you'll need are stored. I have the key here.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If you want me to trust you, you have to start being honest with me. Why do ''you'' have the key?''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''[[Hades]]... had me tidy the treasury for him once.''
(Asked "How safe is it to steal from [[Kronos]]?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It isn't wise to steal from the [[Titan|titans]].''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''The Titans fell long ago. No harm in using their tools to put a stop to the [[Monger]].''
(Asked "What's going on between you and Hades?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So what, you're Hades' housekeeper now?''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''I like to work for him only on occasion. That is all. Think of me as his... mentee.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Hades doesn't strike me as the mentoring type.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''There's much about Hades that you don't understand.''
(Leave – "Let's go.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll need those gauntlets if we want to catch the Monger.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''My thoughts exactly. I'll offer my assistance as your personal guide through the treasury.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's just get this over with.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Of course, ''misthios''. Whatever you need.''
Elpenor unlocked the treasury and led the way inside.
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Tread carefully. The prisoners of [[Tartaros]] have been known to attack this cave.''
They entered a repository filled with scrolls and immediately encountered the escaped prisoners. They killed them and continued on until they found a barricaded path.
*'''Elpenor:''' ''It looks as though this path can be cleared from the other side.''
They continued down the adjacent path into a room filled with lava and pillars only a skilled athlete could climb.
*'''Elpenor:''' ''If you wouldn't mind climbing across and letting me pass...''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I might consider it. Then again, i might not. I'll see how I feel when I get there.''
Kassandra left Elpenor where he was and navigated the pillars and chains to reach the other side of the room.
*'''Elpenor:''' ''I do hope you're clearing the path for me.''

<tabber>
|-|(Elpenor left behind)=
Kassandra left Elpenor behind and walked into the treasury. After a while a disappointed Elpenor entered behind her.
*'''Elpenor:''' ''There you are. You ''do'' realize how much time we could have saved if you had cleared the path. You left me to fend for myself.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You seem to have made it here in one piece. Wherever here is.''
|-|(Elpenor helped)=
Kassandra killed more escaped prisoners and navigated the twisting corridors of the repository. She eventually found herself on the other side of the barricaded path.
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Well done. Now, clear the path and I can join you.''
Kassandra broke the wine jars blocking the shelf and shifted it out of the way.
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Perfect. Now, let's get to the treasury.''
As they walked back through the halls, they spoke of Hades once again.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So... How's working for the god of the dead?''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''You really want to know?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Try me.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''All the myths and stories don't come close to doing Hades justice. He's cunning. Inspiring. A true architect of life... And also of death. He's everything I aspire to be.''
They eventually reached the treasury proper. Kassandra looked around in awe.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What is this place?''
</tabber>

*'''Elpenor:''' ''Kronos' Treasury. Kronos hid all his worldly possessions here, far away from the sons that had been prophesized to be his undoing.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It was my favorite story as a child.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''All the myths, stories, and epics told throughout the generations were transpiring beneath us all along. And now we get to play among the gods, together.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's find the gauntlets quickly.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Over here.''
Elpenor led her to a treasure pile and found the gauntlets after a minimal amount of effort. He held them out to her.

<tabber>
|-|Thank you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''These gauntlets will help me get past the [[Tartaros Veil|Veil]]. Thanks for your help.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''My pleasure, of course.''
|-|I'll take that.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take those gauntlets. Unless you were thinking about keeping them for yourself?''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''I... I wouldn't dream of it.''
</tabber>

*'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. Let's get out of here.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''We make a great pair. Meet me at the [[Lost Temple of Nyx]] when you're ready to take on the Monger.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra obtained the Gauntlets of the Fallen.
Section_Trivia: *Whether players leave Elpenors behind or clear his path can change his dialogue a little in [[The Snake Sheds His Skin]], but doesn't change the outcome.
